Hi! I am a Computational Plankton Ecologist. This means that I study plankton ecology from very large datasets, which I torture using diverse computational tools. I am currently a Research Scientist at the National Oceanography Centre ([NOC](https://noc.ac.uk/)) in Southampton, UK.
